answers.text:
You must download e-documents at the time of ordering. A link to the e-document you ordered is included on the invoice you received at checkout. This is the last page you will see during the online transaction. You cannot return to the ICMA Bookstore to download e-documents after you have left the invoice screen. The links to download are located on the lower left corner of the screen on the invoice page. 
If you have navigated away from this page, you can request to have them sent to you by emailing bookstoremanager@icma.org

author: Mark Hochman
text: I've placed an order for two ICMA articles. First, how can I find a record of my order on your site? I see no obvious links. Then, how can I download PDF files of the articles so that I don't have to wait for ICMA to send the pieces by mail?.
title: how to download a PDF file of article?
